wstop:Topic.wstop:MessagePattern: /idc:event[idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_COMPLETED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_COMPLETED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_FAILED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_FAILED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_FAILED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_FAILED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_FAILED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_FINISHED']
